title: UI: New writing request + request detail (latest draft)

task.description: Create /write page with a form to POST /api/writing-requests and redirect to /requests/:id on success. Create /requests/[id] page that GETs /api/writing-requests/:id and renders request fields plus latest draft content. Handle 409 style-not-ready with a CTA link to /style.
acceptance_criteria: F1-AC7: When not logged in, /write displays an auth-required error banner from the API with a link to /login.
F3-AC2: Submitting a valid topic creates a request and navigates to /requests/:id where the latestDraft.content is visible on first load.
F3-AC5: Visiting /requests/:id for a non-owned/unknown id shows a 404-style empty state (no data leakage) and does not render any draft text.
F3-AC2: If titleHint is provided in /write, the detail page draft includes the exact titleHint substring.
F3-AC2: If API returns 409 with message STYLE_PROFILE_NOT_READY, /write shows an error banner and a visible button linking to /style.

definition_of_done: Pages use existing UI primitives and have loading/empty/error states.
After successful creation, the user ends on /requests/:id with content displayed.
ui_requirements: Routes: /write and /requests/[id]. /write: Card with Inputs for topic/titleHint and Textareas for keyPoints/constraints, submit Button (disabled while loading). /requests/[id]: header with topic + status Badge, DraftViewer in Card. States: loading skeleton; empty 404 state; error banner with retry; 409 conflict state includes CTA to /style.
